name: Hiking Â· Cresta del Gallo
description: This hiking experience is part of the Murcia Welcomes You monthly calendar. It is a social and accessible outdoor activity designed to explore one of the most iconic natural viewpoints around Murcia, meet new people, and enjoy the landscape at a relaxed pace.
schedule: Participants should arrive 10 minutes early. Duration: 3â€“4 hours.
meeting_point: The exact meeting point will be shared after registration and on the day of the activity.
who_for: Beginners to intermediate hikers, international students and locals, people who enjoy nature and social walks.
what_to_bring: Comfortable hiking shoes, Water, Sun protection, Light snacks, Comfortable clothes.

name: Line Dance
description: Line Dance is a fun, social and inclusive activity where everyone dances together following simple choreographies. No partner is needed and no previous dance experience is required.
who_for: All levels, people who enjoy music and movement.

name: Tech Club
description: Tech Club is a casual and open space to explore technology, digital tools, AI and creative tech ideas together. It is not a formal class or lecture.
who_for: Beginners and curious minds, students, creatives and entrepreneurs.

name: HIIT Training
description: HIIT Training is a high-intensity workout focused on strength, cardio and functional movement. Sessions are adaptable to different fitness levels.

name: Beach Volley
description: Beach Volley sessions are relaxed, social and inclusive. The focus is on playing together, moving, laughing and enjoying the beach environment.
